This city can build an additional area, and gain +15% [ICON_Production] productivity when constructing buildings and wonders, and gain an additional 20% [ICON_Production] productivity bonus when conducting projects.

The Witch of Seven Lights will use a powerful spell card to summon a double-A substitute messenger with power and speed. [NEWLINE] "Stand throw tiles!" Qiyao Witch shouted. But it seems that this was originally an emoticon of Fran.
[COLOR:60,200,15,255]木符「自然印记」[ENDCOLOR]

Combat units gain +7 [ICON_Strength] combat strength when defending on forest or rainforest cells. All units can now "freely travel" through woods and rainforests. If you own the Vietnam DLC, you can plant plantations in advance. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Before the battle begins, it’s better to take a breather. Qiyao Witch thought so. There is an old saying: "If a worker wants to do his job well, he must first sharpen his tools." Perhaps using this [COLOR:60,200,15,255] wooden talisman [ENDCOLOR] would be a good choice.
[COLOR:60,160,255,255]水符「多喝热水」[ENDCOLOR]

Coastal cities receive an additional +2 [ICON_Housing] housing and +1 [ICON_Amenities] amenity. All cities gain +35% [ICON_Production] productivity when building "aqueducts" or "ports", and cities with aqueducts will receive an additional +1 [ICON_Amenities] amenity. Immediately unlock the "Celestial Navigation" and "Shipbuilding" technologies, and +1 [ICON_Movement] movement for water transport units. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE] "Drink more hot water!" Sakuya and the eldest lady often say this. The Scarlet Devil Mansion originally uses black tea as its signature drink, but the Witch of Seven Lights is not suitable for drinking tea. So, she wrote the four-character mantra on the spell card, hoping to remember it all the time.
[COLOR:255,90,90,255]Fire Talisman "Constant Temperature Burning"[ENDCOLOR]

Enemy units within 2 cells of the friendly city will be burned by [COLOR:255,90,90,255][ENDCOLOR]: suffer 5 points of [ICON_Damaged] damage each round. [NEWLINE] Enemy units within 2 cells of friendly combat units will suffer [COLOR:255,90,90,255] vulnerability[ENDCOLOR] effect: -4[ICON_Strength] combat strength when defending. +40 strategic resource reserve. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]As with all Western magic stereotypes, a magician who can't fireball is not a good magician. But it seems that the era of chaos and chaos has passed? Perhaps the more "mild" Firestorm version is the answer...
[COLOR:255,150,30,255]土符「点石成金」[ENDCOLOR]

The quarries in the territory +2 [ICON_Gold] gold coins, and the mines +1 [ICON_Gold] gold coins. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE] Turning readily available materials into gold is every alchemist's ultimate dream. Although the Witch of Nanaya is not interested in the money market in Gensokyo, it is still better than nothing. After all, the name sounds very "cool".
[COLOR:240,240,0,255]日符「人工太阳」[ENDCOLOR]

The Witch of the Seven Lights will use an extremely powerful spell card, which will create a [COLOR:240,240,0,255] high-light era [ENDCOLOR] without darkness. [NEWLINE] "Light the way forward!" Hey, where have you heard this sentence before? [NEWLINE]While in the [ICON_GLORY_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age, all cities receive +5% [ICON_Science] technology value, [ICON_Culture] culture value, [ICON_Gold] gold coins, and [ICON_Production] productivity. This spell card will gain an additional 26 era points after being cast.

This is the most powerful spell card of the Seven Lights Witch with no side effects. Its only drawback is that it consumes too much energy and requires the guidance of other elemental spell cards. Use this final blow to detonate the whole place! [NEWLINE] Randomly unlock 5 [ICON_TechBoosted] Eurekas and [ICON_CivicBoosted] Inspirations. [NEWLINE]Increase the [ICON_Science] technology and [ICON_Culture] culture value of all cities by 10%. [NEWLINE]All cities [ICON_Strength] have defense +10. [NEWLINE]Remove all fog of war and achieve maximum [ICON_VisSecret] diplomatic visibility for all civilizations.
[COLOR:127,127,127,255] Silence "Inactive Philosopher's Stone" [ENDCOLOR]

The Philosopher's Stone has not yet been activated. Complete the spell card array of seven different elements to awaken the energy of the Philosopher's Stone! [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR:255,0,0,255]Warning: Do not attempt to activate the unawakened Philosopher's Stone, otherwise it will bring devastating disaster. [ENDCOLOR]

Unlocks the builder's ability to build rare earth formations. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+10[ICON_Science] technology value, +3[ICON_Gold] gold coins. Provides +1 Charm to surrounding cells. You can also launch ultimate devices from it. Unlocking more technologies will provide more [ICON_Gold] gold coins.

Unlocks the builder's ability to build Elfwells. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1[ICON_Faith] faith value, +1[ICON_Gold] gold coin. Units on the Elf Well can recover all health points in 1 turn. Units can teleport over the Well. Unlocking more technology and culture can provide more [ICON_Science] technology value, [ICON_Culture] culture value, [ICON_Faith] faith value, [ICON_Production] productivity and [ICON_Gold] gold coins. Each city can only build one Elf Well.
Well of Elves

PatchPa the Rapper

This is a personalized music and dance course tailored by Meiling for Patchouli in order to prepare for M1 Manga. After completion, Patchouli will be full of life and vitality, and all units will have +1 extra [ICON_Movement] movement when moving. [NEWLINE] Of course, M-1 Mancai also has its mysteries, especially when it "moves" for the first time after the 10-round cooldown.
boundary crossing

You can use magic to explore supernatural space phenomena through bugs with the help of the Secret Club. Once completed, the current city will lose 2 [ICON_Citizen] population points and your exoplanet exploration will be accelerated by 1 light year per turn. [NEWLINE][ICON_New][COLOR:255,45,45,255]Warning: The city must have at least 3 [ICON_Citizen] population before sending an envoy out of Gensokyo to visit the Secret Club. If the city has less than 3 [ICON_Citizen] population, it will not receive any benefits! [ENDCOLOR]

Lianzi and Mei Li successfully crossed the boundary and found the secret of a different world outside the system! The speed of exoplanet exploration will be increased by 1 light year each round, bringing you one step closer to technological victory!

Moon Talisman·Preparatory Style, this is a basic spell card that was designed because I really couldn’t figure out what it could be used for. Likewise, it is also the latest to be designed among the basic spell cards.

The Seven-Glow Witch herself has to prepare a large number of spell cards to form a spell array in a city, which will greatly consume the resources of the core city. Therefore, a "catalyst" is needed to slightly lubricate the launch of these projects.

Of course, why not decentralize these spell cards to all cities? One reason is that if the array of spell cards is scattered, can one card be called a "array"? Another reason is that it's too unbalanced! You must be thinking about opening up cards throughout the city after industrialization, right? That’s what you think! That’s what you think, right?

It's okay, it's so cheap. Just think of it as a stepping stone. After all, the wooden talisman is a prerequisite for unlocking at least 7 cards. By fire be purged! Or, to put it more colloquially, let the fire purify everything! No one can refuse fire magic, even Western magicians who learn Eastern magic.

In fact, the original design was not like this, but a "self-defense" spell card similar to the wooden charm. After all, who will be defeated by AI in PVE?

Earth talismans, quite naturally, turn stone into gold. This is the first basic element spell card designed, so the effect is relatively simple and plain, which is obviously different from the increasingly flashy designs that followed.

In the beginning, this spell card cost a lot, second only to the Philosopher's Stone. Although, this is still the case. After all, if you turn stones into gold, what others earn is Dollar, which is not easy to balance.

As for the composite spell cards designed later, they are just like the Three Kingdoms, they become more and more fancy, with the "Sun and Moon Talisman·Ming Card" being the most popular. From this point of view, everything is a process from simple to complex, except traditional Chinese characters.

It is worth mentioning that among the composite spell cards, the plank leg castle was indeed the first to be designed, so that later on only the unimaginable "Water and Wood Talisman·Bingtang Snow Pear" could compete with it. Of course, there is the last water and earth talisman. I really can’t think of it, so I took an original serious talisman card and wrote it down, thinking of Nokia~

The sun talisman illuminates everything. But the sun is not a light bulb. No, the sun is also a light bulb. But the library is in the basement, so we can only light the lights. Of course, it would be a good choice to borrow A Kong from the Earth Spirit Palace and hang it on the ceiling. It just depends on whether the two old ladies on the mountain next door let the birds go.

The True Philosopher's Stone is different from the original "Philosopher's Stone" which is a symbol of fire, water, wood, metal and earth. The original Philosopher's Stone only had the elements of the five elements, while the True Philosopher's Stone added the energy of the sun and moon. There is no doubt that being strong will do the trick.

The Philosopher's Stone is different from Kaguya's "Ai Zhe Red Stone". After all, Kaguya doesn't actually know how to use the Ai Zhe Red Stone, she just uses it for fun. Humph~ She won’t know the secret of this red stone’s past life!

This Philosopher's Stone seems to be recorded in many documents. Alchemists in the East are trying to find the elixir of life, while those in the West are looking for this "perpetual motion machine" with infinite energy. But none of them can be found, because of the first law of thermodynamics? There is no common sense in Gensokyo, but magic still relies on science! Knowledge is Power!
If you create the unsealed Philosopher's Stone, you will lose. Don't ask, asking means you've already lost. Can you still turn it over to me?

The Great Elementalist is a great man transformed from elements. In fact, the prototype is the Oriental fan club. When I flipped through the list of THB fan clubs, I looked at the clubs I had seen and the ones I had never seen before. The status recorded at the back was either "active", "inactive", or "transferred to non-Touhou", and I felt full of sadness.

Only a very small number of fan clubs can persist, and most of them are disbanded and no longer active. Even existing societies, as strong as Foxtail-grass, have moved on to non-Eastern. As strong as Soul Sound Spring and Ton Otome, they also have core members leaving the team.

However, there are also small clubs emerging one after another, and large clubs are also expanding their enrollment. Large groups such as symphony neets and Tamusic. Needle Music, led by Yuki Shirataki, is a newly established club in 2015. The Fantasyland Poems series is well done. Although it is newly established, as soon as you hear Egret, you know it is not simple.

Yuki Shiratori, I have worked in both the Genre Music Workshop and the Genre Mikaidou. If you haven’t heard of these two, then you know the phantom music of Anonymous Dog, right? As the main organizer, the music works of Needle Music are basically chamber music, and there is not much reverberation in the arrangement. Compared with the large arrangements such as wave, tamusic, and neets, the small arrangement of Needle Music has formed a unique feature.

Acupuncture Music has a lot of activities in China, and its discs have distribution channels in China, so it is not very difficult to get them. Of course, coming back to the old question, if you are buying CDs not for collection, but for use, and you only use your computer's optical drive to play them, it's better not to buy them.

Now that we have talked about it for this reason, I will simply "bullshit" my poor point of view. What should you do after buying a physical album? The first is to judge the collection value. For example, the collection value of "Lovelight" (refer to the "Alstroemeria" encyclopedia interface for details) is obviously higher than the listening value. That is specifically for collection. But like Music of the Needle, it is ~not valuable~ and does not have typical collection value.

Therefore, there are two methods: first, rip the audio files in the physical CD into electronic audio and convert them to streaming media. However, the lossless audio of Acupuncture Music is very easy to find on the Internet, and can even be found on NetEase Cloud. So there is little value in doing so.

The second method, I strongly recommend that rich people who are not short of money choose this method to get the original listening experience. For such small-scale chamber music, the most suitable way is to put the CD into a desktop CD player, then connect the speakers, pour a cup of coffee, and sit on the sofa. If you don't buy such a set of equipment and just listen to it with your original headphones that are 9 yuan and 9 free shipping, are you worthy of such great music? This is every audiophile's mid-level dream. Why not ultimate? Because I can’t afford to burn it, Ultimate Edition will also change the room into a listening room (laughs).

Of course, there is actually a third solution, which is to buy a Japanese portable CD player that has been discontinued and connect it to Sennheiser's big ear. Unfortunately, I have not tried any of these three methods. Because I neither have a desktop CD player nor a Senhai steamed bun, and I don’t even bother to insult this sacred music with the original price of 9 yuan (scare). So now I have piled up half a cabinet of CDs, all of which are real "collectibles".

Weiyue Pavilion, one of the genre series clubs. Its leader, Yuuchi Kaede, is also a legendary figure. Successively founded the undetermined genre, Wei Jie Tang, Mei Yueting, and Chinese Opera Troupe. Now they have given up the prefix of the genre and changed their name to Sound Bank to continue their activities. People who know him well know that he continues to make music, but those who don’t know him think he is hiding from debts.

The discs of this genre are not very expensive, and even though it has been closed down for so many years, a few of Wei Jie Tang's discs are still being sold. One "Festival" is completely superior to the four Foxtail-Grass Studio limited editions for each season.

After "Sacrifice", Zongzi started the prelude to single-titled albums. But there are some words that are very strange variant words that cannot even be typed under normal circumstances. For example, "彁", "迿" and "贴", even if you show these words to a Chinese teacher, they all sound profound. (There are four kinds of "return" feelings from Kong Yiji)

RD seems to like to persecute the singer Merami, and often writes some particularly high notes. As a result... many bands who wanted to cover the song were deterred. RD will also compose some pure music by himself, which is interspersed in each album.
Withered Leaf Palm will also invite some other vocals to make guest appearances, such as Zhonghui Guangcheng, Butter Candy (nayuta), etc.

Silver Forest, also translated as Silver Forest, is an old-established society. So far, more than 60 albums have been released, which can be said to be as prolific as a sow. Although it is not very popular in China, I randomly asked someone in the Eastern group, do you know Yinsen? Usually the awkward question is, "What is Yinsen?" Only a few people could answer, Oh, the bento song one.
It seems like there are basically no people left who know these things. (laugh)

In addition, the artist page introduction of NetEase Cloud Music has not been updated yet. Silver Forest is obviously alive, and the lead singer has returned. It is clear that after 12 years, it has released a new album after a few hits, but it is still written that it has disbanded. Nobita's information is really ill-informed.

The strings play the water piano movement, a simple society. About its content, you can find it in kk’s B station column, which is written much better than mine. However, there is no mention of this piece of "Mizuminato Fantasy -Recurrence Imagination-"

The official website interface of the society is still open, and it has a crude and crude picture. There is only Kirishima's personal diary, which basically talks about what content will be brought to the CM every year, but basically it is "Sorry, there is only one new song this time, selling for 100 yen." "Sorry, there are no new works this time, I brought some old works." Although, this club stopped writing Touhou-related content after 2009. Alas, if you write this kind of thing too much, you will become depressed.
恒萃工坊，主催胡博士，一手創辦《東方文化學刊》。想法很好，但不建議平時不看書和靜不下心的人購買。因為內容太枯燥晦澀，看不懂，也不具有很高的收藏價值。換句話說，你會專門買一本紙質的SCI的期刊嗎？
在華燈宴上，胡博士也是年年都有的常客。每年都能整出新活來。

Chronicles of the East, Tears of the Times. Even today, the quality is no worse than any sketch game. But because the materials used are like workshop mods, they are not original and therefore cannot be profitable.

During the production process of Orange Wind Chimes, irreconcilable differences of opinion emerged one after another, which also led to the disbandment of the entire production team after the release of the work. It is difficult to reconcile everyone's opinions, which is a very core reason. Perhaps only "indie" games in a truly narrow sense can avoid such a thing from happening.
The entire production team, including lead promoter Yue Cheng MOKO, also disappeared afterwards, with no news from them.

It is worth mentioning that a translation team is making this great work into English and then promoting it to the world through Steam. All I can say is that this is the only good news in so many years.

Aquamarine, aquamarine, also known as aquarium (English Aquarium) among the people. A handicraft factory comparable to Qingwen, a typical example of "although the body is humble, the heart is as high as the sky." Nothing has been produced, but there are a lot of plans.
As a result, after GSC took over, although the prototype was great, the price took off immediately, and there were delays and delays. Ordering a handbag is almost like an interest-free loan.
Some of Aquamarine's prototypes are impressive, but the overall quality is still uneven.

Aqua Style, Aqua's style (crossed out). A club that makes both games and music. Excellent work on games and music. Back then Bu Si Huan came out of nowhere and shocked the audience. Then, Aqua embarked on the road of making things worse.

From Bu Si Huan in 2008, to the subsequent Wenchu ​​barrage travel, to TOD and LLR, Aqua has been idle for more than ten years. It was a hot topic until Danmaku Kagura. When I looked at the cover picture, I thought I had finally changed the art. I clicked in and saw, How old are you?

Foxtail-Grass Studio, as a oriental fan club, when I opened my mouth, I would definitely blow a rainbow fart, and I would buy the disc even though I was trying to sell it (actually I only have one fantasy about a scene monster).

Starting from the original album "pastoral landscape", Foxtail-Grass Studio has shown its unusual side. Even with such a high starting point, the subsequent albums are no less impressive. There are two fantasy scenes and four spring, summer, autumn and winter limited editions. They are making great progress all the way, which also makes Surugaya bolder. Do you think this thing is so easy to sell? As a result, the current expensive price has been created.

The dog house (Suruga House) has four paintings of spring, autumn and winter hanging all year round. Without summer, it has never been sold because the price has climbed to one thousand, and the price of "pastoral landscape" has also climbed to four figures. Recently, the number of fantasy scenes has also increased by four digits. In a sense, investing in Foxtail-Grass dishes is indeed a financial product.

Nowadays, the society has moved to non-Eastern countries, and the price of original discs is not so outrageous, it can even be said to be very cheap. I don’t know whether it’s because no one is buying it, or because the release date is so short that the price can’t go up.

Alstroemeria Records, hereinafter referred to as AR, is one of the three major oriental electronic music companies. As for this Yusan family, it is no longer possible to test. But the name still passed down. Namely AR, AE (ALICE'S EMOTION) and Sound Online. To be honest, I haven’t heard a few songs from the other two until now. Maybe it’s because of the deviation in music style, I don’t know much about it. But since it is the home court of AR, let’s talk about AR.

At the beginning, there were not many vocals in fan groups, and they were basically pure music. AR was the first to be at the forefront of the times. Riding on this trend, it suddenly became a benchmark in the Eastern fan community. However, the subsequent development was not as popular as it was at the beginning. Because there are so many pieces of music produced, they appear to be very mediocre, with no particularly outstanding highlights. Until that familiar name appeared.

In 2007, a paper album titled "Lovelight" with Suzuxian as the cover came out. At that time, it had not caused much fluctuation. A year later, in the same year as the Beijing Olympics, a draft of the photo-painting titled "BAD APPLE!!" appeared on the n site. After that, it was continuously improved until the version we see today is the most widely circulated. And AR’s song “Rotten Apple” has also been wildly popular. It is rare for a fan to inspire another fan.

To this day, BAD APPLE is no longer as popular as it was when it dominated the charts a few years ago. When I looked back at Lovelight, I realized that the entire album was a pillar of strength. Except for BAD APPLE, other songs are completely unable to match such high popularity.
I am fortunate to receive such an album, an album of great collectible value and historical significance. Of course, not only BAD APPLE, but also the big rabbit on the cover is my favorite.
DDBY, I like its Jazz style very much. Among the major clubs, there are not many people who play Jazz music, so they are specially selected as EX greats.

In fact, it’s not just the Cafe series and 8bit, Yufeng’s Secret Series is also very good. The biggest feature of DDBY is that its albums are released in a series one after another, either finishing with two or three albums, or releasing seven or eight albums like Cafe, or even continuing to release them under another name.
However, DDBY's albums are inherently expensive. The latest ones are close to 2,000 yen, which is almost as high as the album prices of non-Oriental popular works.

FELT is closely related to the fever witch. From the beginning, the relationship was similar to the relationship between C-Clays and K2 Sound, but it became bigger and bigger later on, making it difficult for people to imagine that these two clubs actually have such a subtle relationship.

Instead of choosing the Fever Miko, FELT was chosen here. The main reason is that FELT collapsed last year and Fever Miko is still alive. How long a society can last depends not only on whether the works can continue to persist, but also on whether the founder is willing to persist.

FELT has also produced quite a few albums, perhaps because they feel they have exhausted the space for each song. It should be mentioned that it happened to be the same year that Liz (Sen Luo's predecessor club) announced its comeback. When I saw this kind of news, I felt really mixed emotions.

Xiaor, Vocal is Stack, similar to Ino Otome, but this is a brother and sister combination. Stack is known for her husky and powerful voice, having sung under CrossGear. "Oriental Love Song", like Lovelight, is also a song "Suirenka-" that drives the entire album, but the price is even more outrageous than Lovelight... Alas, it's all tears.
Among Akatsuki's CDs, "Karako", a child sacrifice song adapted from "NO SIGNAL", is also very popular, but the price is much better and you can buy it without much effort.

Xiaor has a shortcoming, that is, it particularly likes to set limits, so that it makes it very uncomfortable for people who have no time or space to run around and want to collect (not me). There are only more outrageous limits, not less. For example, FELT's C79 limited edition next door, such as Qiu Mankai, which has a small quantity and seems to be limited in availability.
I don’t know much about N-tone, I just listened to electronic albums. Of course, I know that N-tone’s physical albums have become more and more expensive in recent years.

Oiko, N-tone’s lead singer, is a very interesting person, and his arrangements are quite special. Especially the last song "Fairy Breath", I am very curious about what instruments it is arranged with.

Maikaze, dance style, is Tokine's one-man club. From painting to arranging music, all I have to do is perform vocals myself. Because of this reason, Dream Summer Township is called an Olympic series. (Due to the postponement of the Tokyo Olympics, it’s a shame that Dream Summer Village 4 has also been postponed)

"Dream Summer Village" occupies a very high position in Eastern fan animations. In a sense, although it is not as good as Fantasy Wanhua Mirror, it is in a sense higher than Wanhua Mirror. There is no way, Wu Feng has only released one episode after four years, so the evaluation depends entirely on the support of peers.
In terms of music, dance-style music is also unique. "The Quiet Sound of the East", "Tan of the Eastern Divine Moon" and Xia Xiang's music collection are all first-class masterpieces.

YELLOW ZEBRA would have become an ordinary oriental fan music club. However, because of Dongfang M-1 Mancai, he became famous in one fell swoop. The first and second issues were in the form of radio dramas without physical animation. After the third issue, animation started.

The club is not particularly outstanding in music, and its main achievement is the unique M-1 comic talent. However, due to some reasons, the club was disbanded, and another club called "R-note" was opened to continue its activities.

In 2021, R-note cooperated with China's Huainan Teahouse, officially entering the public's field of vision. (The previous M-1 comics only had the folk Chinese version of Miao Yudian, and there was also a small amount of it sold in Jiangou in the 13th and 14th editions.)

Unlike Dream Summer Country, the M-1 manga was secretly reposted on YouTube, and the community did not stop it. It was even officially released on YouTube for free (search R-note to see the official account). What is a work of conscience? Doesn't your club make any money at all?
What we see is not only flesh, but also art. It is no exaggeration to say that it can emerge from the mud but not be stained, and it can wash away the clear ripples without being evil.

Is the picture drawn by KE-TA really the R version? It has transcended the usual concept of R-origin - just like the Statue of David - even though the Statue of David is not suitable to be placed in public places in China. It is because of the conservative thinking of the public. Since we are in such a big environment, we cannot criticize blindly. From the perspective of both sides, it is correct.

However, there is still a small amount of highly toxic drugs circulating in the Chinese market. However, due to the vigorous campaign against pornography and illegal activities in recent years, R's inspections are relatively strict, and it is estimated that they will not be shipped in. It’s better to enjoy it online. If you want to buy a physical one...to be honest, I would too.

Different from KE-TA, the most famous Gensokyo Paradise project of Minato (the leader is Ginyo Hare, which is actually a personal club) is an R version in the general sense - an R version drawn purely for the sake of H.

An interesting fact is that Ginyo Haru once participated in the regular festival with 1,200 copies of Gensokyo Land Plan, but not a single copy was sold - because the exhibition organizers felt that the coding was too shallow. He was so angry that he announced that he would never attend the exhibition again.
As for what happens next? It was just an angry statement made in a moment of excitement.

Griffon, also known as Griffon. The factory lives up to its name. Now closed. (So ​​only QQ Club is the cornerstone of the Oriental official figure industry. Get out of here, you sneer!) The workmanship of the scene is the same as the price of the figure. If it hadn't been producing a large number of Touhou figures for decades, it probably wouldn't be on the EX table with its scummy workmanship.

If you can buy figures of relatively unpopular Eastern characters, don’t be surprised, they will definitely be awesome. If you can produce 18th-tier characters like Tomaru Hoshi, Mei Dixin, and Nazling, what else can't you do that Ji Libeng can't do? (Oh, the QQ club next door also produced Ibis, so that’s okay)

Geilibeng is also famous for its large number of different colors, but the different colors are usually a kind of torture, no matter how ugly it is, it is said to be very avant-garde, so that I can't appreciate it. To put it bluntly, you paint a color with your feet and then dare to sell it?
However, I think the different color (red) of Huiyin Baizawa ver is comparable to the primary color, even though the one I listed here is still the primary color.
When it comes to Halozy, it must be...
Triple☆ice cream! ! ! ! ! ! ! !
Because the Wuqi series was too magical, other Halozy songs were downplayed. When it comes to Halozy, it's like triple ice cream. Later, Halozy himself could hardly escape Wuqi.

The taste of 薬さらい is called "medicinal taste" among the people. We often see statements like: "Your book smells like medicine." The reason is that the painting style is particularly magical. For example, "Canned Human Flesh", I strongly recommend that newbies read this book first, it is very door-to-door if you can understand it♂

According to legend, Lu Xun was deeply impressed after reading the medicinal book. He said that he couldn't sleep anyway, so he read carefully for half the night, and then he saw the words between the words. There were two words written all over the book: "cannibalism"!

Kyoto Fantasy Theater, a fan club affiliated to Jonker, mainly produces fan animations. The plot is basically original, and the quality has become better and better over the years. If you are interested, it is still worth buying. However, the peripherals of the special edition are too expensive, twice the price, and most of the bells and whistles are of no use.

In fact, the quota for fish bone manufacturing is obtained through competition with the club "いよかん." The sign on one side is "Bamboo Flower" and the sign on the other side is "The Wind Cries". The influence of "Bamboo Flower" is also quite large, so much so that RD even wrote a song with the same name (included in "Recommendation")

However, despite such works, the society produced its last work a year later and was never heard from again. By the way, it’s the いよかん mentioned in the previous paragraph. Now it has also moved to the non-Eastern world.
38BEETS is very classic. Only one song of a club is popular in the circle, and no one listens to the other songs.

I left the last seat of greatness to 38BEETS because I was deeply moved by its last tweet. Just like what I wrote in "Strings and Water Piano Movement". 38BEETS is a microcosm of many oriental fan communities. Many societies, perhaps before they became widely known, were dissolved. By the time it was discovered, it had already lost its luster.

After all, there has been no absolute objective judgment about art since ancient times. Picasso's paintings were able to sell for sky-high prices during his lifetime because he knew marketing. There are very few great artists who can be discovered like Van Gogh. Van Gogh was lucky for the time being. At least he can still be considered a great artist after his death. How many impoverished painters and apprentices have been lost to history?

When I write these encyclopedias, I sometimes use a joking tone, or write some plain text. As for some things I didn’t want people to know, I mostly just brushed them off or didn’t mention them at all. I don’t want to write down all of these “behind the scenes”.

Sometimes I still think that being a fan is probably like the college entrance examination, with only a few top scorers. After so many years, when I look back, no matter good or bad, I will only think, oh, I was just like this when I took the college entrance examination. In the same way, when I look back and think about myself as a Touhou fan, it's the same.

The orange wind chimes, water piano music played by strings, 38BEETS, fish bones, and even the relatively large aquarium mentioned in this mod are all very powerful, Felt, and they are all just like this. Only we Asyongs can record some past stories in words to show that they have been here before.
In 1970, the Dongfanghong-1 satellite was launched into space and the song "Dongfanghong" was broadcast to the world, heralding the arrival of China's "Oriental" culture.

Thirty or forty years later, on major music platforms, for some reason, the following characters will always appear in the comment sections of Eastern fan music: fishermen and fish, policemen and imps. The Eastern police incident in 2013 was a new climax.
Nowadays, such things are still happening, but the momentum has been reduced a lot. Maybe Che Wan has really passed up~
